text:
David Beckham is the ultimate dad.

The 42-year-old former soccer star added a new tattoo to his growing collection of designs, dedicating his latest tat to his four children: Brooklyn, Romeo, Cruz and Harper.



RELATED: David Beckham Made Son Brooklyn Wait to Get His First Tattoo With Him!

On Monday, Beckham shared a pic on his Instagram stories of the latest addition on his neck, which reads "Dadda."

Instagram

Beckham, who went to Hollywood tattoo shop Shamrock Social Club, also shared another snap of tattoo artist Mark Mahoney touching up his additional ink.



WATCH: David Beckham Is 'So Proud' of Daughter Harper Riding a Bike for the First Time -- See the Heartwarming Video!

Earlier in the day, he documented his hiking trip with his daughter, Harper, and sons. Romeo and Cruz.

Instagram

Last month on The Late Late Show With James Corden, Beckham gushed about his growing kiddos and how sad he was that Brooklyn was getting ready to leave the nest. He also shared the story about being there for his eldest son's first tattoo.

See more of what he had to say about the experience below.
